name: coexist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to live or exist together, esp. in peace, at the same time or in the same place: The two communities coexist peacefully.
coexistence noun [ U ] us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˌkoʊ·ɪɡˈzɪs·təns/
Peaceful coexistence is our only real hope.
